Name: Ally Switch

Description: Boosts user's Special Defense by 2 stages.
Name: Amnesia

Description: Boosts user's Defense by 2 stages.
Name: Barrier

Description: Boosts user's Special Attack and Special Defense by 1 stage.
Name: Calm Mind

Description: 10% chance to confuse opponent.
Name: Confusion

Description: Boosts user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
Name: Cosmic Power

Description: Leeches 50% of the damage dealt. Only works if target is asleep.
Name: Dream Eater

Description: 10% chance to flinch the target.
Name: Extrasensory

Description: Deals damage at the end of the turn after three turns.
Name: Future Sight

Description: For 5 turns, prevents flying or jumping. Also negates Ground immunities.
Name: Gravity

Description: Averages Defense and Special Defense stats of the user with the target.
Name: Guard Split

Description: Swaps user's Defense and Special Defense stages with the target.
Name: Guard Swap

Description: Prevents opponents from healing for 5 turns.
Name: Heal Block

Description: Heals the target by 50% its max HP.
Name: Heal Pulse

Description: Faints the user, but heals the replacement.
Name: Healing Wish

Description: 30% chance to flinch the target.
Name: Heart Stamp

Description: Switches user's stat changes with target's.
Name: Heart Swap

Description: Puts the target to sleep.
Name: Hypnosis

Description: No opponent can use any of the user's moves.
Name: Imprison

Description: Lowers target's accuracy by 1 stage.
Name: Kinesis

Description: Doubles your team's Special Defense for 5 turns.
Name: Light Screen

Description: Faints the user, but the replacement is healed completely.
Name: Lunar Dance

Description: 50% chance to lower target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
Name: Luster Purge

Description: Bounces back certain non-damaging moves.
Name: Magic Coat

Description: Held items have no effect for 5 turns.
Name: Magic Room

Description: Boosts user's Attack by 1 stage.
Name: Meditate

Description: Blocks evasion modifiers. Allows user's Psychic-type moves to hit Dark-types.
Name: Miracle Eye

Description: If hit by a special attack, returns double the damage.
Name: Mirror Coat

Description: 50% chance to lower target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
Name: Mist Ball

Description: Averages Attack and Special Attack with the target.
Name: Power Split

Description: Switches Attack and Special Attack boosts with the target.
Name: Power Swap

Description: Switches Attack and Defense stats.
Name: Power Trick

Description: 10% chance to confuse the target.
Name: Psybeam

Description: 10% chance to lower target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
Name: Psychic

Description: Lowers user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
Name: Psycho Boost

Description: Has a high critical hit rate.
Name: Psycho Cut

Description: Transfers status ailments to the target.
Name: Psycho Shift

Description: Damage is based on the target's Defense stat.
Name: Psyshock

Description: Damage is based on the target's Defense stat.
Name: Psystrike

Description: Does random damage equal to .5x-1.5x the user's level.
Name: Psywave

Description: Lowers damage from physical attacks to the user's team for 5 turns.
Name: Reflect

Description: The user goes to sleep for two turns and restores all HP.
Name: Rest

Description: Copies the foe's ability and overwrites the user's ability.
Name: Role Play

Description: The user and the target trade abilities.
Name: Skill Swap

Description: Varies in power depending on number of boosts accumulated by user.
Name: Stored Power

Description: Only damages targets of the same type as the user.
Name: Synchronoise

Description: Lasts 3 turns and makes all moves hit the target.  Makes target immune to Ground-type moves.
Name: Telekinesis

Description: Flee from wild Pokemon battles.
Name: Teleport

Description: Switches items with the target.
Name: Trick

Description: Slower Pokemon move first for 5 turns.
Name: Trick Room

Description: Swaps Defense and Special Defense of all Pokemon.
Name: Wonder Room

Description: 20% chance to flinch the target.
Name: Zen Headbutt

Description: Has a high critical hit rate.
Name: Attack Order

Description: User steals the effect of the target's held Berry.
Name: Bug Bite

Description: 10% chance to lower target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
Name: Bug Buzz

Name: Defend Order

Description: Leeches 50% of the damage dealt.
Name: Leech Life

Name: Megahorn

Description: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

Name: Quiver Dance

Description: 10% chance to confuse the target.
Name: Signal Beam

Name: Silver Wind

Name: String Shot

Name: Struggle Bug

Name: Tail Glow

Name: Twineedle

Name: X-Scissor

Name: AncientPower

Name: Head Smash

Name: Rock Tomb

Name: Rock Wrecker

Description: Has a high critical hit rate.
Name: Stone Edge

Description: Protects user and allies from multi-target attacks.
Name: Wide Guard

Name: Astonish

Description: Confuses the target.
Name: Confuse Ray

Name: Curse

Name: Lick

Name: Shadow Punch

Name: Draco Meteor

Name: Dragon Dance

Name: Dragon Pulse

Name: Dragon Rush
